Title: Relates to care and protection of children
Summary: Relates to care and protection of children; adds to the definition of children at risk infants who test positive for a controlled substance not prescribed by a physician, in their bloodstream or urine, are born dependent on such drugs or who demonstrate drug withdrawal symptoms, or who have been diagnosed with a condition attributable to in utero exposure to illegal drugs.
LawCode: Amd §§2541 & 2542, Pub Health L; amd §371, Soc Serv L; amd §1012, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, the social services law and the family court act, in relation to care and protection of children
